body { background: #161823; } .aboutContainer { position: relative; width: 1050px; margin: 100px auto 0; background: #161823; } .aT,.aR,.aB,.aL { width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; } .aT { width: 0; border-top: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -webkit-animation: tA 1s ease 1s forwards; -moz-animation: tA 1s ease 1s forwards; } .aR { height: 0; border-right: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -moz-animation: rA 1s ease 1s forwards; -webkit-animation: rA 1s ease 1s forwards; } .aB { left: 953px; width: 0; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -moz-animation: bA 1s ease 1s forwards; -webkit-animation: bA 1s ease 1s forwards; } .aL { height: 0; top: 100%; border-left: 1px solid rgb(233, 241, 246); -moz-animation: lA 1s ease 1s forwards; -webkit-animation: lA 1s ease 1s forwards; } @keyframes tA { to { width: 100%; } } @keyframes rA { to { height: 100%; } } @keyframes bA { to { left: 0; width: 100%; } } @keyframes lA { to { top: 0; height: 100% } } .svg { margin: 50px 30px; } .draw { stroke-dasharray: 1310; stroke-dashoffset: 1310; fill: #161823; -moz-transition: fill 2s ease; -webkit-transition: fill 2s ease; -moz-animation: draw 6s ease 2s forwards; -webkit-animation: draw 6s ease 2s forwards; } @keyframes draw { to{ stroke-dashoffset: 0; } } .fill { stroke-dasharray: 1310; stroke-dashoffset: 1310; -moz-animation: fill 5s ease 2s forwards; -webkit-animation: fill 5s ease 2s forwards; } @keyframes fill { to { stroke-dashoffset: 0; fill: #161823; } } .aboutContainer .content{ width: 1010px; padding: 50px 20px 50px; background: rgb(233, 241, 246); opacity: 0; -moz-transition: opacity 2s ease 2s; -webkit-transition: opacity 2s ease 2s; } .headerImg { width: 200px; opacity: 0; margin: -35px auto 0; } .imgAnimation { -moz-animation: iA 2s ease forwards; -webkit-animation: iA 2s ease forwards; } @keyframes iA { to { margin-top: 0px; opacity: 1; } } .img { width: 100%; } .aboutContainer .content p { width: 100%; height: 18px; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; color: #606060; line-height: 5px; opacity: 0; } .pAnimation { -moz-animation: pA 1s ease forwards; -webkit-animation: pA 1s ease forwards; } @keyframes pA { to { opacity: 1; line-height: 18px; } } .aboutContainer .content .year { margin: 30px 0; font-size: 14px; color: #9B989F; }

(function(){ /* è°ƒæ•´archiveé¡µnavæ ·å¼ */ //èœå•æŒ‰é’® $('.menu-section').css('position', 'absolute'); $('.name').text('tangyuan').css('color', '#ffffff'); $('.navBtn').css('background-color', '#ffffff'); //search $('.search').css({'background':'#161823', 'color': '#ffffff', 'border-color':'#ffffff'}); $('.searchBtn').css({'background':'#161823', 'color': '#ffffff'}); //svgåŠ¨ç”»ï¼Œæ–‡ç« èƒŒæ™¯å¡«å……é¢œè‰² setTimeout(function(){ $('.draw').css('fill', 'rgb(233, 241, 246)'); $('.content').css('opacity', 1); }, 4000); //æ ¹æ®æµè§ˆå™¨æ»šåŠ¨åŠ è½½æ–‡å­— $(window).scroll(function(){ var wst = $(window).scrollTop(); //påŠ¨ç”» for (var j in arr) { if ( parseInt(arr[j].offset().top)-550 < wst ){ arr[j].addClass('pAnimation'); } } //imgåŠ¨ç”» if (parseInt($('.headerImg').offset().top)-550 < wst) { $('.headerImg').addClass('imgAnimation'); } }) })();

body { width: 100%; position: relative; background: #161823; } .menu-section { position: fixed; top: 10px; left: 50%; width: 1200px; opacity: 1; border-radius: 6px; transform: translateX(-50%); } .menu-section-black { background: #cccccc; } .menu-section-animation { width: 100%; opacity: 0.5; margin-top: 0; border-radius: 0; top: 0; animation: menuSectionAnimation 0.5s ease; } @keyframes menuSectionAnimation { 0%{ top: 10px; width: 1200px; opacity: 1; } 100%{ top: 0; width: 100%; opacity: 0.5; } } .searchList { position: fixed; top: 45px; } .contactContainer { padding-top: 80px; padding-bottom: 20px; color: #cccccc; } .contact p { margin: 0; } #disqus_thread { background: #e9f1f6; width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; border-radius: 6px; padding: 0 10px; box-shadow: 3px -3px 5px #85918f; } .footer { position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100px; text-align: center; line-height: 100px; color: #cccccc; font-size: 14px; background: #161823; } .footer a { text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; } .nav .searchBtn, .search{ background: #cccccc; }
